title: Iron Zeit Tyson 4/21: Mike Tyson, CNN+, Rudy Giuliani, Supreme Court Ruling Against Puerto Rico, Gratuity Fatigue & Joel Embiid
itunes:title: Iron Zeit Tyson 4/21: Mike Tyson, CNN+, Rudy Giuliani, Supreme Court Ruling Against Puerto Rico, Gratuity Fatigue & Joel Embiid
description:
On this edition of Trends, Jack and Miles discuss Mike Tyson punching a drunk passenger that was accosting him on a JetBlue flight, the shuttering of CNN+, Rudy Giuliani's appearance on The Masked Singer, the Supreme Court ruling that Puerto Ricans don't have constitutional rights to federal benefits, a New York Times article about 'gratuity fatigue,' Joel Embiid's game-winning 3-point buzzer beater in OT and Bill Simmons' freezing cold basketball takes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Mike Tyson, CNN, 76ers, Joel Embiid, Sixers, NBA, Rudy Giuliani, The Masked Singer, Supreme Court, Puerto Rico, New York Times, NYT, Gratuity Fatigue, Bill Simmons
